description: A student of Yazagaku who works with George to run their own brand, Paradise Kiss. She is the younger sister of the Happy Berry brand`s creator/president, Kouda Mikako, who is the protagonist in Yazawa Ai`s Gokinjo Monogatari work. She is exceptionally sweet and cute. Miwako tends to act in a rather childlike manner, both in her Lolita style dress and unique vocabulary.
name: Sakurada Miwako
